### Exercise 1
```{python}

import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
from scipy.stats import norm

far = [.94, .84, .58, .27, .12, .02]
hr = [.99, .96, .94, .84, .58, .42]
df = pd.DataFrame(
    {
        "Criterion Level": [1,2,3,4,5,6],
        "Hit Rate": hr,
        "False Alarm Rate": far
    }
)

z_df = pd.DataFrame(
    {
        "Z_SN": [norm.ppf(1.0-p) for p in hr],
        "Z_N": [norm.ppf(1.0-p) for p in far]
    }
)

px.scatter(z_df, x="Z_N", y="Z_SN", trendline='ols')

```
